post.author: 부기흡

comment.author: 김형태
comment.content: 프로젝트 후반에 많은 도움이 될 것 같습니다. 감사합니다.

post.content:
Did some research on the JUnit-based testing tools from SourceForge.

=============
NUnit .Net unit testing framework

NUnit brings xUnit-style unit-testing to all .Net languages. Initially ported from JUnit, the current version has been re-written to take advantage of .NET language features.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/nunit/

=============
NUnitForms

NUnitForms is a tool for automatically testing Windows Forms applications written on .NET. It is an extension to NUnit that should make it easy to test Windows Forms applications.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/nunitforms/

==============
VSNUnit

An integrated NUnit test runner for Visual Studio .NET that allows for graphical display of test results, and easy navigation from results to source code.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/vsnunit/

===============
VSUnit

VSUnit provides a Visual Studio Addin for use with NUnit. It will support integrated unit testing, debugging and test generation. VSUnit is being developed as a separate project by the developers of NUnit itself.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/vsunit/

===================
Zanebug

Zanebug is an advanced unit testing application for .NET. It supports existing NUnit tests, performance metrics, multiple test iterations, in-depth error information, pass / fail stats, perfmon integration, result graphing, etc.

http://sourceforge.net/projects/zanebug/

=======================
DotTestToolkit

A library of classes designed to be used in conjunction with a unit testing framework such as NUnit. The library facilitates automated tests, mock objects and white box testing (GUI testing etc).

http://sourceforge.net/projects/dottesttoolkit/

==========================
Nunit integration to visual studio.net

nunit add-in to visual studio.net

http://sourceforge.net/projects/nvunit/

==============
end
post.title: [test] functional/performance testing tools for .net
